meta.description: Discover the latest posts and insights about {{topic}}. Stay updated with trends and articles.

posts.title: Spring Boot DevTools
posts.summary: Learn how to utilize Spring Boot DevTools for rapid development. Includes live reload, caching, and debugging tips.

posts.title: Clean Coding Practices in Spring Boot
posts.summary: Learn how to apply clean coding principles in Spring Boot projects. Includes best practices, examples, and benefits of using Lombok in Java and Kotlin clean code techniques.

posts.title: Dependency Injection in Spring Boot
posts.summary: Learn how Dependency Injection (DI) works in Spring Boot, including examples in Java and Kotlin. Covers key concepts, annotations, and practical use cases.

posts.title: Aspect-Oriented Programming (AOP) in Spring Boot
posts.summary: Learn how to implement Aspect-Oriented Programming (AOP) in Spring Boot using Java and Kotlin. Covers core concepts, use cases, and practical examples.

posts.title: Spring Boot Actuator
posts.summary: Learn how to use Spring Boot Actuator to monitor and manage your applications with ease. Includes endpoints, customization, and security examples.

posts.title: Object-Relational Mapping (ORM)
posts.summary: Learn how to set up an ORM-based application with Spring Boot using Java, Kotlin, and Go (Gin). Includes PostgreSQL integration and basic CRUD operations.

posts.title: Building APIs with Spring for GraphQL
posts.summary: Learn how to build GraphQL APIs using Spring for GraphQL with Java and Kotlin. Includes schema creation, query handling, and integration.

posts.title: Input Validation in REST APIs
posts.summary: Learn how to implement input validation in REST APIs using Java, Kotlin, and Go with frameworks like Spring Boot and Gin. Covers annotations, custom validators, and error handling.

posts.title: Gin - First Application
posts.summary: A beginner-friendly guide to creating your first Golang Gin application from scratch. Learn the basics and start your journey with Gin.

posts.title: Building a REST API with Spring Boot
posts.summary: Learn how to create a REST API using Spring Boot. Includes HTTP methods, JSON handling, Lombok integration, and curl for testing.

posts.title: Spring Boot - First Application
posts.summary: A beginner-friendly guide to creating your first Spring Boot application from scratch. Learn the basics and start your journey with Spring Boot.
